name: GrainDamage
description:
It started like any other day,in the middle of the day, you go to throw the trash. Suddenly, out of the garbage pops out an angry piece of toast that transform you to a pidgeon and dissapear. Give chase,follow his breadcrumbs and force him to turn u back to normal.

Created at 16/7/19 for Universe Game Jam 2# and was made in 3 days.

Theme:Transformation

Credit:

Art- Aya Malberger.

Sound- Itamar Gilat

Game Programmers- Alon Livne, Michael Rapazki, Roni Kosta
